CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SiteVisit__c)), SiteVisit__r.HideRolesNewEditDelete__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(AmendmentRequest__c)), AmendmentRequest__r.HideExternalEdit__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Award__c)), OR( NOT(Award__r.HasEditAccess__c), IF( IsKeyContact__c, OR( Award__r.HideGrantorEdit__c, Award__r.AmendmentNumber__c != 1 ), false ) ), true ) ) )
CustomField.label: Hide Edit Delete
